channel.title: News on Maria Dermit
channel.description: Recent content in News on Maria Dermit

item.title: Mardakheh website
item.description: The Mardakheh lab website is live! https://t.co/9VA5GFg2fn — Maria Dermit (@DermitMaria) June 12, 2020

item.title: BCI Webinars
item.description: Making ribosomes to translate cancer I delivered a talk at BCI Thursday seminar series on our work on regulation of ribosome biogenesis by subcellular RNA localization. In this work published in bioarxiv I demonstrated how a RBP called LARP6 regulates ribosome biogenesis in migrating cells. You could watch the full talk (QMUL access only) here

item.title: RNA2020
item.description: RNA2020 On RNA2020 I presented our CLIF (cross-linking and fractionation) method to analyse subcellular localization patterns of human RNA and proteins.

item.title: WFH Weekly Bulletin
item.description: Q&A with Maria Dermit This week I answered some questions for the WFH Weekly Bulletin ðŸ“°. I have been fundraising for CRUK as part of the BCI Running Team. If you want to join us or donate, please visit.

item.title: IWD
item.description: WomenInScience On IWD I talked with @QMBCI and sayed what IWD means to me Happy #InternationalWomensDay!

item.title: RNAUK2020
item.description: RNA2020 On RNAUK2020 I presented our results on subcellular localization of RP-mRNAs to protrusions.
